verses.verse: I love <WH157> Yahweh, <WH3068> because he listens <WH8085> to my voice, <WH6963> and my cries for mercy. <WH8469>
Because he has turned <WH5186> his ear <WH241> to me, <WH7121> therefore I will call on him as long as I live. <WH3117>
The cords <WH2256> of death <WH4194> surrounded <WH661> me, <WH4712> the pains of Sheol <WH7585> got a hold <WH4672> of me. <WH4672> I found trouble <WH6869> and sorrow. <WH3015>
Then I called <WH7121> on the name <WH8034> of Yahweh: <WH3068> "Yahweh, <WH3068> I beg <WH577> you, <WH4422> deliver my soul. <WH5315>"
Yahweh <WH3068> is Gracious <WH2587> and righteous. <WH6662> Yes, <WH430> our God is merciful. <WH7355>
Yahweh <WH3068> preserves <WH8104> the simple. <WH6612> I was brought low, <WH1809> and he saved me. <WH3467>
Return <WH7725> to your rest, <WH4494> my soul, <WH5315> for Yahweh <WH3068> has dealt bountifully with you. <WH1580>
For you have delivered <WH2502> my soul <WH5315> from death, <WH4194> my eyes <WH5869> from tears, <WH1832> and my feet <WH7272> from falling. <WH1762>
I will walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>
I believed, <WH539> therefore I said, <WH1696> "I was greatly <WH3966> afflicted. <WH6031>"
I said <WH559> in my haste, <WH2648> "All men <WH120> are liars. <WH3576>"
What will I give <WH7725> to Yahweh <WH3068> for all his benefits toward me? <WH8408>
I will take <WH5375> the cup <WH3563> of salvation, <WH3444> and call <WH7121> on the name <WH8034> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> to Yahweh, <WH3068> yes, <WH5971> in the presence of all his people.
Precious <WH3368> in the sight <WH5869> of Yahweh <WH3068> is the death <WH4194> of his saints. <WH2623>
Yahweh, <WH3068> truly <WH577> I am your servant. <WH5650> I am your servant, <WH5650> the son <WH1121> of your handmaid. <WH519> You have freed <WH6605> me from my chains. <WH4147>
I will offer <WH2076> to you the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving, <WH8426> and will call <WH7121> on the name <WH8034> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> to Yahweh, <WH3068> yes, <WH5971> in the presence of all his people,
in the courts <WH2691> of Yahweh <WH3068>'s house, <WH1004> in the midst <WH8432> of you, <WH3389> Jerusalem. Praise <WH1984> Yah! <WH3050>
